DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy dexmethylphenidate ( d-MPH ) treatment chemotherapy-related fatigue adult cancer subject .
DOC.brief_title: D-MPH Treatment Fatigue Neurobehavioral Function Related Chemotherapy Adult Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis cancer , exclude primary metastatic brain tumor . Treated minimum four cycle cytotoxic chemotherapy , last chemotherapy treatment must complete least 2 month prior study entry . Physical/neurological examination consistent absence focal neurological deficit Women childbearing potential ( WCBP ) must negative serum urine pregnancy test . In addition , sexually active WCBP must agree use adequate contraceptive method ( oral , injectable , implantable hormonal contraceptive ; tubal ligation ; intrauterine device ; barrier contraceptive spermicide ; vasectomized partner ) . Subjects must able adhere protocol requirement . Subjects must understand voluntarily sign informed consent document . Subjects must native English speaker fluent English , least eighth grade education .
